title: Serif G Looks like a familiar classic typeface
content:
Hello! I have tried pairing many classic typefaces with this graphic but none seem to match 100%. It looks familiar but I am unable to identify it. Any help is appreciated. Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418190650im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202015-02-26%20at%208_4874.57.12%20PM.png)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot 2015-02-26 at 8.57.12 PM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418190650/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202015-02-26%20at%208.57.12%20PM.png) | 34.84 KB |
author: bobmarley65

comments.content: Hard to tell, but try [Minion](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418190650/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/minion/) by Robert Slimbach.
